body_html:
I'll do it, implement 1D and 2D Gaussian. I'll be grateful if anyone can give me guidance.

I think we should first register ops in tensorflow/core/ops/math_ops.cc, then implement in tensorflow/core/kernels/, then implement python api in tensorflow/python/ops/math_ops.py.

body:
I'll do it, implement 1D and 2D Gaussian. I'll be grateful if anyone can give me guidance.

I think we should first register ops in tensorflow/core/ops/math_ops.cc, then implement in tensorflow/core/kernels/, then implement python api in tensorflow/python/ops/math_ops.py.
